data.eml:eml: A new species of the deepwater clingfish genus Kopua (Gobiesociformes: Gobiesocidae) from the East China Sea—an example of antitropicality?

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Moore, Glenn I., Hutchins, Barry, Okamoto, Makoto (2012): A new species of the deepwater clingfish genus Kopua (Gobiesociformes: Gobiesocidae) from the East China Sea—an example of antitropicality? Zootaxa 3380: 34-38, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.281716
